0: SELECT       (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.CustomerID)        FROM transactions_1k t        JOIN customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID        WHERE c.Currency = 'EUR')       /       (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.CustomerID)        FROM transactions_1k t        JOIN customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID        WHERE c.Currency = 'CZK') AS ratio_eur_czk  	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
1: SELECT customers.CustomerID, customers.Segment FROM customers WHERE customers.CustomerID = (SELECT CustomerID FROM (SELECT CustomerID, SUM(Consumption) AS TotalConsumption FROM yearmonth WHERE Date BETWEEN 201201 AND 201212 GROUP BY CustomerID) AS ConsumptionTable ORDER BY TotalConsumption ASC LIMIT 1);	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
2: SELECT AVG(total_consumption / 12) AS average_monthly_consumption FROM (SELECT SUM(tr.Amount) AS total_consumption FROM transactions_1k tr JOIN customers c ON tr.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE c.Segment = 'SME' AND strftime('%Y', tr.Date) = '2013') AS subquery;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
3: SELECT czk_consumption - eur_consumption AS consumption_difference FROM (SELECT SUM(Amount) AS czk_consumption FROM transactions_1k JOIN customers ON transactions_1k.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID JOIN yearmonth ON transactions_1k.Date = yearmonth.Date WHERE customers.Currency = 'CZK' AND yearmonth.Date BETWEEN 201201 AND 201212) AS czk_consumption_subquery CROSS JOIN (SELECT SUM(Amount) AS eur_consumption FROM transactions_1k JOIN customers ON transactions_1k.CustomerID = customers.CustomerID JOIN yearmonth ON transactions_1k.Date = yearmonth.Date WHERE customers.Currency = 'EUR' AND yearmonth.Date BETWEEN 201201 AND 201212) AS eur_consumption_subquery;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
4: SELECT Year FROM (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(t2.Date, 1, 4) AS Year, SUM(t1.Amount) AS TotalConsumption FROM yearmonth t2 INNER JOIN transactions_1k t1 ON t2.CustomerID = t1.CustomerID WHERE t1.ProductID IN (SELECT ProductID FROM products WHERE Description = 'Gas') GROUP BY Year) t ORDER BY TotalConsumption DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
5: SELECT SUBSTRING(Date, 5, 2) AS Peak_Month FROM (SELECT Date, Consumption FROM yearmonth WHERE Date BETWEEN 201301 AND 201312 AND CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'SME')) AS subquery GROUP BY SUBSTRING(Date, 5, 2) ORDER BY MAX(Consumption) DESC LIMIT 1;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
6:
WITH customer_consumption AS (
  SELECT c.CustomerID, c.Segment, SUM(t.Amount) AS total_consumption
  FROM customers c
  JOIN transactions_1k t ON c.CustomerID = t.CustomerID
  JOIN yearmonth y ON t.Date = y.Date
  WHERE y.Date BETWEEN 201301 AND 201312
  GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.Segment
),
min_consumption AS (
  SELECT Segment, MIN(total_consumption) AS min_consumption
  FROM customer_consumption
  GROUP BY Segment
),
sme_avg_consumption AS (
  SELECT AVG(total_consumption) AS avg_consumption
  FROM customer_consumption
  WHERE Segment = 'SME'
  AND total_consumption = (SELECT min_consumption FROM min_consumption WHERE Segment = 'SME')
),
lam_avg_consumption AS (
  SELECT AVG(total_consumption) AS avg_consumption
  FROM customer_consumption
  WHERE Segment = 'LAM'
  AND total_consumption = (SELECT min_consumption FROM min_consumption WHERE Segment = 'LAM')
),
kam_avg_consumption AS (
  SELECT AVG(total_consumption) AS avg_consumption
  FROM customer_consumption
  WHERE Segment = 'KAM'
  AND total_consumption = (SELECT min_consumption FROM min_consumption WHERE Segment = 'KAM')
),
sme_lam_diff AS (
  SELECT (SELECT avg_consumption FROM sme_avg_consumption) - (SELECT avg_consumption FROM lam_avg_consumption) AS diff
),
lam_kam_diff AS (
  SELECT (SELECT avg_consumption FROM lam_avg_consumption) - (SELECT avg_consumption FROM kam_avg_consumption) AS diff
),
kam_sme_diff AS (
  SELECT (SELECT avg_consumption FROM kam_avg_consumption) - (SELECT avg_consumption FROM sme_avg_consumption) AS diff
)
SELECT 'SME-LAM' AS segment, (SELECT diff FROM sme_lam_diff) AS diff
UNION ALL
SELECT 'LAM-KAM' AS segment, (SELECT diff FROM lam_kam_diff) AS diff
UNION ALL
SELECT 'KAM-SME' AS segment, (SELECT diff FROM kam_sme_diff) AS diff;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
7: WITH   consumption_2012 AS (    SELECT       c.Segment,       SUM(y.Consumption) AS consumption_2012    FROM       yearmonth y    JOIN       transactions_1k t ON y.Date = t.Date    JOIN       customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID    WHERE       y.Date LIKE '2012%' AND t.Amount > 0 AND c.Currency = 'EUR'    GROUP BY       c.Segment  ),   consumption_2013 AS (    SELECT       c.Segment,       SUM(y.Consumption) AS consumption_2013    FROM       yearmonth y    JOIN       transactions_1k t ON y.Date = t.Date    JOIN       customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID    WHERE       y.Date LIKE '2013%' AND t.Amount > 0 AND c.Currency = 'EUR'    GROUP BY       c.Segment  ),   percentage_increases AS (    SELECT       c1.Segment,       (c2.consumption_2013 - c1.consumption_2012) / c1.consumption_2012 * 100 AS percentage_increase    FROM       consumption_2012 c1    JOIN       consumption_2013 c2 ON c1.Segment = c2.Segment  )  SELECT     Segment,     percentage_increase  FROM     percentage_increases  ORDER BY     percentage_increase DESC  	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing
8: SELECT SUM(Amount) FROM transactions_1k WHERE CustomerID = 6 AND strftime('%Y%m', Date) IN (SELECT DISTINCT strftime('%Y%m', Date) FROM yearmonth WHERE strftime('%Y%m', Date) BETWEEN '201308' AND '201311');	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing

11: WITH lam_customers AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerID) AS total_lam_customers FROM customers WHERE Segment = 'LAM'), lam_customers_more_than_46_73 AS (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.CustomerID) AS lam_customers_more_than_46_73 FROM transactions_1k t JOIN customers c ON t.CustomerID = c.CustomerID WHERE c.Segment = 'LAM' AND t.Amount > 46.73) SELECT (lam_customers_more_than_46_73 / total_lam_customers) * 100 AS percentage FROM lam_customers, lam_customers_more_than_46_73;	----- bird -----	debit_card_specializing

78: WITH male_in_patients AS (      SELECT COUNT(ID) AS male_in_patients_count      FROM Patient      WHERE SEX = 'M' AND Admission = '+'    ), male_out_patients AS (      SELECT COUNT(ID) AS male_out_patients_count      FROM Patient      WHERE SEX = 'M' AND Admission = '-'    )    SELECT       CASE         WHEN m.male_in_patients_count > o.male_out_patients_count THEN 'More male in-patients'        WHEN m.male_in_patients_count < o.male_out_patients_count THEN 'More male outpatients'        ELSE 'Equal number of male in-patients and outpatients'      END AS result,      ROUND(ABS((m.male_in_patients_count - o.male_out_patients_count) / (m.male_in_patients_count + o.male_out_patients_count) * 100), 2) AS deviation_percentage    FROM male_in_patients m, male_out_patients o;  	----- bird -----	thrombosis_prediction
